alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 01 at 1:18AM MST until September 01 at 2:15AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 215 AM MST. * At 118 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Kingman-Butler, or near Kingman, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kingman, Windy Point Campground, Wild Cow Campground, Dw Ranch Road, Packsaddle Campground, Chloride, New Kingman-Butler, Blake Ranch Road, Hualapai Mountain Park, Golden Valley, Dolan Springs and Hualapai Peak. This includes the following roads... Interstate 40 in Arizona between mile markers 27 and 67. Highway 93 in Mohave County between mile markers 41 and 70. State Route 68 in Mohave County between mile markers 13 and 28. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
